game_description: Get ready to experience racing like never before. Use your epic driving skills and use all the powerups to cross first in the finish line. Feature List - Compete in 4 different game modes - Multiplayer, Championship, Arcade and Time Trial. - Cross-Platform Multiplayer Support - Car Washing Mini-Game - Compete against others on the Leaderboards - Over 13 different cars to choose from, ranging from Sports cars to Vintage cars. - Customize your cars with new Skins, Toppers and Boosters. - Collect coins to upgrade your cars to be the best they can be. - 9 different tracks, each have their own sets of obstacles and challenges for you to overcome and emerge victorious. - 8 Different Championships to play through - Play through all the levels in arcade mode and time trial - While you're racing watch out for the opponents who like to go rogue and push you off the edges of the track. Internet Connectivity only required to play the online game mode. Rest of it can be played offline. ABOUT US Smash Game Studios is an Indie Game company focused on creating compelling experience for Mobile, PC and Emerging Platforms
review_1: I really enjoyed the Steam Version of the game, so decided to pick it up. I initially thought I might face motion sickness like other racing, fortunately didn't have any of those issues with it here. Absolutely loved the Car Wash Mode, spent a good bit of time just washing cars even when they were clean. I also enjoyed some of the game modes that were there in the PC version from a unique perspective. I know that the developer consistently updates the game on Steam quite often. Hoping that this version is no different and has a tons of new updates. If you enjoy Micro Machines and Mini Motor Racing on Oculus, definitely give it a try.
